channel.title: Rsps Advertisements!
channel.description:
So I just figured that I would pay it forward, I found a page on Instagram that does advertisements for RSPS. They remove their pictures every month to keep a clean page and they continually spam Instagram with photos of advertised servers. These people helped me get more players than anyone else I've turned to. They have drawn in over 700+ players to different servers alike in only 2 months of them being up and running, so if you are looking to grow your server these people know what they are doing.
P.S: Forgive me if this is in the wrong thread!
[IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc475/michael77wheeler/5870e475b297d8078ff56902b8a9c5df_zpsmfl2m2kn.png[/img]

item.title: Rsps Advertisements!
item.dc:creator: @Runecessor Runecessor
item.description:
@Runecessor wrote:

Hell yea dude! thanks for showing them to me! they helped me grow my player base pretty fast!
